author: abayer
msg: SQOOP-165. Improved log message for unknown types.

author: abayer
msg: Minor changes to AsyncSqlExecThread to use execute instead of executeUpdate
and to DBRecordReader to allow subclasses to access the configuration object.

author: abayer
msg: SQOOP-153. Enable tests against real cluster.

author: abayer
msg: SQOOP-152. Support for test against cluster.
This change allows Sqoop unit tests to be run against a real cluster.

author: abayer
msg: SQOOP-140. Control max. number of fetched records.
This change adds the ability of specifying the max. number of fetched records
from the database. This will solve problems that may arise when importing
